parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup set.

> * You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~62172~~) operation to query the backup ID.
> * You must specify one of the **RestoreTime** and BackupId parameters.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value of this parameter must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 30. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: RestoreTime
parameters.description:
The point in time to which the instance is restored. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> * The time can be a point in time within the past seven days. The time must be earlier than the current time, but later than the time when the instance was created.
> * You must specify one of the RestoreTime and **BackupId** parameters.

parameters.name: SourceDBInstance
parameters.description: The ID of the source instance.
